add_library(utility OBJECT utility.f90)
add_executable(autlab autlab.f90 $<TARGET_OBJECTS:utility>)
add_executable(double double.f90)
add_executable(triple double.f90)
add_executable(keepbp keepbp.f90 $<TARGET_OBJECTS:utility>)
add_executable(keeplp keeplp.f90 $<TARGET_OBJECTS:utility>)
add_executable(keepuz keepuz.f90 $<TARGET_OBJECTS:utility>)
add_executable(keepsp keepsp.f90 $<TARGET_OBJECTS:utility>)
add_executable(deletelp deletelp.f90 $<TARGET_OBJECTS:utility>)
add_executable(listlabels listlabels.f90 $<TARGET_OBJECTS:utility>)
add_executable(reduce reduce.f90 $<TARGET_OBJECTS:utility>)
add_executable(relabel relabel.f90 ../f2003.f90)
add_executable(zero zero.f90)
